# Copy API Token

You can copy your API token from the token details page.

## Copying an API token

To copy a token:

1. Navigate to the **API tokens** page. Then, find the token you want to copy.
2. Select the token to open its details page.

<div data-with-frame="true"><figure><img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/image (923).png" alt=""><figcaption><p>The details page of a token.</p></figcaption></figure></div>

3. From the **General** tab, do the following as needed:
   * To copy the endpoint, select the copy option <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="<svg xmlns=&#x22;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#x22; height=&#x22;24px&#x22; viewBox=&#x22;0 -960 960 960&#x22; width=&#x22;24px&#x22; fill=&#x22;#5f6368&#x22;><path d=&#x22;M360-240q-33 0-56.5-23.5T280-320v-480q0-33 23.5-56.5T360-880h360q33 0 56.5 23.5T800-800v480q0 33-23.5 56.5T720-240H360Zm0-80h360v-480H360v480ZM200-80q-33 0-56.5-23.5T120-160v-560h80v560h440v80H200Zm160-240v-480 480Z&#x22;/></svg>" data-size="line">for the **API endpoint**.&#x20;
   * To copy the token value, select the copy option <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="<svg xmlns=&#x22;http://www.w3.org/2000/svg&#x22; height=&#x22;24px&#x22; viewBox=&#x22;0 -960 960 960&#x22; width=&#x22;24px&#x22; fill=&#x22;#5f6368&#x22;><path d=&#x22;M360-240q-33 0-56.5-23.5T280-320v-480q0-33 23.5-56.5T360-880h360q33 0 56.5 23.5T800-800v480q0 33-23.5 56.5T720-240H360Zm0-80h360v-480H360v480ZM200-80q-33 0-56.5-23.5T120-160v-560h80v560h440v80H200Zm160-240v-480 480Z&#x22;/></svg>" data-size="line"> for the **API token**.
   * To show the token value, select the visibility icon <img src="../../../.gitbook/assets/icon_eye.png" alt="" data-size="line">. To hide the value, click the icon again.&#x20;

A confirmation message is displayed when the values are copied successfully.&#x20;
